weekly_top_story.headline: US Launches Major Military Operation, Captures Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro
weekly_top_story.summary: The United States conducted a large-scale military strike on Caracas involving 150 aircraft from 20 bases, capturing President Nicolás Maduro and his wife, escalating international tensions with condemnations from Russia and Iran while prompting mediation offers from Spain.

stories.headline: US actions in Venezuela ‘constitute a dangerous precedent’: Guterres
stories.summary: UN Secretary-General António Guterres expressed deep alarm over the US special forces' capture of Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro, warning it sets a dangerous precedent for international relations amid global backlash.

stories.headline: Russia Condemns US Attack on Venezuela, Claims Liberation of 9 Strategic Settlements
stories.summary: Russia denounced the US military operation in Venezuela as a violation of sovereignty while announcing the liberation of nine strategic settlements in an ongoing conflict, heightening East-West geopolitical friction.
